resources.string: Thanks for downloading Coin Collection!\nTo get started, select \'New Collection\'
Press and hold on a collection to view, edit, copy, and more!

This App is meant to help you keep track of which coins you have already come across and saved in your collection. To help keep your collection organized, we recommend purchasing a coin album specific to each type of coin.

The mint marking on most coins can be found near the date that appears on the face of the coin. If no mint mark is present, it typically symbolizes that this coin was produced at the Philadelphia (P) mint. Other possible mint marks include that of the Denver mint (D) and the San Francisco mint (S), although the San Francisco mint has not produced coins for circulation for some time now. Also, for some older coins, the mint marks of the Carson City mint (CC) and the New Orleans mint (O) can be found, and special coins like the American Eagle Silver Dollars may carry the West Point mint mark (W). For more information, feel free to check out the website of the U.S. Mint.

If you have any suggestions or questions about the app, feel free to send an email to andrew27379091@gmail.com.

This app is not endorsed by the United States Mint.
Where would you like to import from?
Select a coin type, choose a name and hit \'Create New Collection!\'
Show the mint mark on the collection page
Change the collection beginning and ending year
Include coins from the Philadelphia mint
Include coins from the Denver mint
Include coins from the San Francisco mint
Include coins from the New Orleans mint
Include coins from the Carson City mint
Include coins from the West Point mint
Include proofs from San Francisco mint
Include silver proofs from San Francisco mint
Include coins with a satin finish
Include the quarters for D.C. and the U.S. Territories
Include Proof quarters for D.C. and the U.S. Territories
Please enter a name for the collection
Please select a collection type from the dropdown menu
Please select at least one mint to collect coins from
Highest possible ending year is %1$d. Note, new years will automatically be added as they come.
Ending year can\'t be less than the collection starting year (%1$d)
Starting year can\'t be greater than the collection ending year (%1$d)
Starting year can\'t be greater than the ending year
Changing the collection type for an existing collection will delete all progress! Do you want to continue?
Changing the collection dates for an existing collection will delete some coin progress! Do you want to continue?
Changing the collection options for an existing collection will delete some coin progress! Do you want to continue?
Please enter a name for the collection
Please enter a name for the coin
Add a coin to your collection by clicking the space above its year or name. Also, you can prevent accidental changes using the \'LOCK\' action
This collection has unsaved changes. Please save before changing views.
Leaving this page will erase your unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
Collection is currently locked, hit the \'Edit\' action to unlock
Press and hold on a coin image to edit, copy, or delete!
This collection has unsaved changes. Please save changes before performing this action.

Drag a collection\'s coin image or tap the up or down arrows to reposition it in the list of collections. Tap \'Save\' when finished.
